attributes.action: Recognise our right to defend our land, homes and amenities from the threat of costal erosion and reverse the policy of English Nature which bars the proper defence of our coast lines from Yorkshire to Devon.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From Yorkshire all the way through Norfolk, Kent & Suffolk land is falling into the sea at an alarming rate. Homes, agricultural land and even Englands oldest golf course is being lost to the elements in areas that have previously been defended by local communities for centuries.English Nature now has a policy of "manged retreat" which will devastate the Norfolk Broads and bar anyone from doing anything about it. It is time to re-claim our land and our right to defend it.
